Class BasicTurtle

java.lang.Object
  AbstractTurtle
      BasicTurtle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Turtle
public class BasicTurtle
extends AbstractTurtle

A very basic turtle that does nothing fancy, but simply moves exactly how it is told and draws a solid line.

Author:
Ilkka Kokkarinen
